Page1.Text: You wake up in your room, laying in bed looking up at the ceiling. Thinking to yourself, you realize that you don't have anything to do today. Looking at your phone, you find that it's Saturday and you have the day all to yourself. It's a day of endless possiblities, so what would you like to do?

Options.Text: If you go back to bed - p10
If you head out of your house - p2

Page2.Text: You head out of your house and onto the street, towards the north there is a nice little cafe you go to occasionally. If you go West you might have a rare encounter, and if you have a death wish, I guess you could walk into the street. Where do you want to go?

Page3.Text: You walk until you get to the cafe. Would you want to go inside?

Options.Text: Made a mistake? Want to start over, here you go. - p1

Page4.Text: You go west, and see a blue police phone box along the sidewalk. Open it?

Options.Text: Open the door and walk inside - p8
Made a mistake? Want to start over, here you go. - p1

Page5.Text: You miraculously walk across a busy street and come to a building, do you go inside?

Options.Text: Made a mistake? Want to start over, here you go. - p1

Page6.Text: You go inside the cafe and get a drink, it was poisoned, you die

Page7.Text: You walk off into the Sunset and live happliy ever after!

Page8.Text: You open the door to find...a normal police phone box.

Page9.Text: You walk past the blue police phone box and hear a strange noise, you look towards it and see the box disappearing.

Page10.Text: What?! I put in all this work to give you a ton of options and you are just throwing it all away!! Just hit the button to try again and don't come back here again!

Page11.Text: You walk inside the mysterious building and find 3 red and white ball shaped things on the ground.

Page12.Text: You stand there marveling at the building and a car comes onto the sidewalk and hits you

Page13.Text: Noooo, You can't just sleep all day! I won't allow it.
